mapper.select: SELECT T.* , (CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(CLOSETIME, '%H%i') >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H%i'), '%H%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H%i') >= STR_TO_DATE(OPENTIME, '%H%i') THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS CHECKOPEN FROM ( SELECT dutyName , wgs84Lat , wgs84Lon , hpid , dutyTel1 , dutyAddr , (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 0 THEN dutyTime1s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 1 THEN dutyTime2s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 2 THEN dutyTime3s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 3 THEN dutyTime4s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 4 THEN dutyTime5s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 5 THEN dutyTime6s END) AS OPENTIME , (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 0 THEN dutyTime1c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 1 THEN dutyTime2c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 2 THEN dutyTime3c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 3 THEN dutyTime4c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 4 THEN dutyTime5c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 5 THEN dutyTime6c END) AS CLOSETIME FROM pharmacy.pharmarcySeoul) T;

SELECT T.* , (CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(CLOSETIME, '%H%i') >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H%i'), '%H%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H%i') >= STR_TO_DATE(OPENTIME, '%H%i') THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS CHECKOPEN FROM ( SELECT dutyName , wgs84Lat , wgs84Lon , hpid , dutyTel1 , dutyAddr , (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 0 THEN dutyTime1s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 1 THEN dutyTime2s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 2 THEN dutyTime3s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 3 THEN dutyTime4s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 4 THEN dutyTime5s WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 5 THEN dutyTime6s END) AS OPENTIME , (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 0 THEN dutyTime1c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 1 THEN dutyTime2c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 2 THEN dutyTime3c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 3 THEN dutyTime4c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 4 THEN dutyTime5c WHEN WEEKDAY(NOW()) = 5 THEN dutyTime6c END) AS CLOSETIME FROM pharmacy.pharmarcySeoul WHERE wgs84Lat >= #{centerLat} AND wgs84Lon <= #{centerLon} ) T;
